name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Extraction: Guardian Edition
summary: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Quarantine is a three-player tactical co-op game set several years in the future of the Rainbow Six universe. Rainbow Six Quarantine is being developed by an entirely new team at Ubisoft Montreal, who were inspired by the long-standing brand legacy of tactical co-op shooters and the varied cast of operators from Rainbow SixSiege, to develop something that is truly more than the sum of its parts.
